resources.string:
Hi, my name is Gina. 

I come from China. 

I am 19 years old. 

I miss my grandparents, but I don't know when I can see them. 

Hope they are happy and healthy! 

I will start my coop next year. Hope I can find a coop. 

I want to earn a lot to buy an apartment in Hamilton, a car, a cat. I hope I can find a great boyfriend, but I am not in hurry, even if I can't find one, it's totally fine.









 















Goodbye!
